yarn add axios axiosInstance.ts import axios from "axios"; import { TOKEN_INFO, getAccessToken, logout } from "apis/account/account"; import type { ITokenInfo } from "apis/account/account.type"; import type { AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse, AxiosError } from "axios"; // ========== Setting ========== // //# Set URL const config: AxiosRequestConfig = { baseURL: `https://${process.env.REACT_APP_BRANCH}.${process.env.REACT_APP_API}`, }; export const axiosInstance = axios.create(config); //# Set Authorization export const setAxiosHeader = (accessToken: string) => { axiosInstance.defaults.headers.common.Authorization = `Bearer ${accessToken}`; }; // ========== Preprocessing ========== // //# Fulfilled Response (200ë²ˆëŒ€ ì‘ë‹µ) const onFulfilled = (res: AxiosResponse): AxiosResponse => { return res; }; //# Rejected Response (200ë²ˆëŒ€ ì™¸ ì‘ë‹µ) const onRejected = async (err: AxiosError): Promise<AxiosResponse> => { const { config, response } = err; if (!config) return Promise.reject(err); // [edge-case] ìš”ì²­ì˜ ì„¤ì •ì´ ì—†ì„ ì‹œ //>> Access Token ë§Œë£Œ ì‹œ if (response?.status === 401) { const tokenInfoStr = localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_INFO); if (!tokenInfoStr) return Promise.reject(err); // [edge-case] Local Storageì— ì •ë³´ê°€ ì—†ì„ ì‹œ const tokenInfo: ITokenInfo = JSON.parse(tokenInfoStr); try { // 0. Refresh Tokenìœ¼ë¡œ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ Access Token íšë“ const newAccessToken = await getAccessToken(tokenInfo.refreshToken); // 1. ê¶Œí•œ ë¶€ì—¬ í—¤ë”ì˜ Access Token êµì²´ setAxiosHeader(newAccessToken); // 2. Local Storageì˜ Access Token êµì²´ localStorage.setItem( TOKEN_INFO, JSON.stringify({ ...tokenInfo, accessToken: newAccessToken, }) ); // 3. í˜„ì¬ ìš”ì²­ì˜ Access Token êµì²´ if (!config.headers) config.headers = {}; // [edge-case] ìš”ì²­ì— í—¤ë”ê°€ ì—†ì„ ì‹œ config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${newAccessToken}`; return axiosInstance(config); } catch (err: unknown) { // [edge-case] Refresh Token ë§Œë£Œ ì‹œ logout(true); return Promise.reject(err); } } return Promise.reject(err); }; axiosInstance.interceptors.response.use(onFulfilled, onRejected); account/account.ts import { axiosInstance, setAxiosHeader } from "apis/axiosInstance"; import type { IAccountInfo, ILoginInfo, _IAccountInfo, _ILoginInfo, } from "./account.type"; export const TOKEN_INFO = "TOKEN_INFO"; export const EXPIRED = "EXPIRED"; export const logout = (isExpired?: boolean) => { if (isExpired) { localStorage.setItem(EXPIRED, EXPIRED); } localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_INFO); window.location.replace(window.location.origin); }; export const login = async (email: string, password: string): Promise<void> => { const res = await axiosInstance.post<_ILoginInfo>("...", { email, password, }); const tokenInfo = { accessToken: res.data.result.access_token, refreshToken: res.data.result.refresh_token, }; setAxiosHeader(tokenInfo.accessToken); localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_INFO, JSON.stringify(tokenInfo)); localStorage.removeItem(EXPIRED); return; }; export const getAccessToken = async (refreshToken: string): Promise<string> => { const res = await axiosInstance.post<Pick<ILoginInfo, "access_token">>( "...", { refresh_token: refreshToken } ); return res.data.access_token; }; export const getAccountInfo = async (): Promise<IAccountInfo> => { const res = await axiosInstance.get<_IAccountInfo>("..."); return res.data.account; }; account/account.type.ts export interface ITokenInfo { accessToken: string; refreshToken: string; } type TAccountType = ...; type TRegion = ...; type TAuthType = ...; export interface ILoginInfo { region: TRegion; auth_type: TAuthType; email: string; access_token: string; refresh_token: string; account_id: string; } export interface _ILoginInfo { result: ILoginInfo; } export interface IAccountInfo { account_id: string; account_type: TAccountType; email: string; region: TRegion; company: { id: number; name: string; }; } export interface _IAccountInfo { account: IAccountInfo; } React Query # yarn add @tanstack/react-query @tanstack/react-query-devtools index.tsx ... import { queryClient } from "queries/queryClient"; import React, { Suspense } from "react"; ... <QueryClientProvider client={queryClient}> <Suspense fallback={<Loading />}> <App /> </Suspense> <ReactQueryDevtools /> </QueryClientProvider> ... queries/queryClient.tsx import { QueryClient } from "@tanstack/react-query"; import { queryErrorHandler } from "./queryErrorHandler"; const generateQueryClient = (): QueryClient => { return new QueryClient({ defaultOptions: { queries: { staleTime: Infinity, cacheTime: 0, retry: false, // ì—¬ëŸ¬ ë²ˆ ì‹œë„í•˜ë©´ ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ëŠë¦¬ë‹¤ê³  ëŠë‚Œ suspense: true, onError: queryErrorHandler, }, mutations: { onError: queryErrorHandler, }, }, }); }; export const queryClient = generateQueryClient(); queries/queryErrorHandler.ts import { AxiosError } from "axios"; import { QUERY_ERROR_KEY } from "../keys/queryKey"; export const queryErrorHandler = (error: unknown): void => { if (error instanceof AxiosError) { switch (error.response?.data.code) { case QUERY_ERROR_KEY.example: console.log("ì˜ˆì‹œ ì—ëŸ¬", error); break; default: console.log("ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬1", error); break; } } else { console.log("ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬2", error); } };

onChange: ( event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement> ) => void; }; value: string; setValue: Dispatch<SetStateAction<string>>; } /** * @param initialValue ? ì´ˆê¸°ê°’; `""` * @param placeholder ? í‘œì‹œì; `""` * @returns `{ attribute, value, setValue }` */ export const useInput = ( initialValue = "", placeholder = "" ): IUseInputResult => { const [value, setValue] = useState(initialValue); const onChange = ( event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement> ): void => { setValue(event.target.value); }; return { attribute: { value, placeholder, onChange }, value, setValue, }; }; // ========== usage ========== // /* const exampleInput = useInput("", "") return ( <input {...exampleInput.attribute} />` ) */ useRange.tsimport { useState } from "react"; import type { ChangeEvent, Dispatch, SetStateAction } from "react"; export interface IUseRangeResult { attribute: { type: "range"; value: number; min: number; max: number; step: number; onChange: (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void; }; value: number; setValue: Dispatch<SetStateAction<number>>; } /** * @param initialValue ? ì´ˆê¸°ê°’; `0` * @param minValue ? ìµœì†Ÿê°’; `0` * @param maxValue ? ìµœëŒ“ê°’; `100` * @param step ? ë‹¨ê³„ê°’; `1` * @returns `{ attribute, value, setValue }` */ export const useRange = ( initialValue = 0, minValue = 0, maxValue = 100, step = 1 ): IUseRangeResult => { const [value, setValue] = useState(initialValue); const onChange = (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>): void => { setValue(Number(event.target.value)); }; return { attribute: { type: "range", value, min: minValue, max: maxValue, step, onChange, }, value, setValue, }; }; // ========== usage ========== // /* const exampleRange = useRange() return ( <input {...exampleRange.attribute} />` ) */ useCheckbox.tsimport { useState } from "react"; import type { ChangeEvent, Dispatch, SetStateAction } from "react"; export interface IUseCheckboxResult { attribute: { type: "checkbox"; onChange: (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void; }; checkedList: string[]; setCheckedList: Dispatch<SetStateAction<string[]>>; } /** * @param allList ì²´í¬ ë°•ìŠ¤ì— í¬í•¨í•  ìš”ì†Œ ê°’ë“¤ * @param limit ? ì²´í¬ ê°€ëŠ¥ ê°œìˆ˜; `null` * @param initialCheckedList ? ì´ˆê¸°ì— ì²´í¬ë˜ì–´ ìˆëŠ” ìš”ì†Œ ê°’ë“¤; `[]` * @returns `{ attribute, checkedList, setCheckedList }` */ export const useCheckbox = ( allList: string[], limit: number | null = null, initialCheckedList?: string[] ): IUseCheckboxResult => { const [checkedList, setCheckedList] = useState(initialCheckedList || []); const onChange = ( event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement> ): void => { const value = event.target.value; if (value === "allCheck") { if (limit !== null) return; if (checkedList.length === allList.length) { setCheckedList([]); } else { setCheckedList([...allList]); } return; } if (checkedList.includes(value)) { setCheckedList((prevCheckedList) => prevCheckedList.filter((checkedValue) => checkedValue !== value) ); } else { if (limit !== null && checkedList.length >= limit) { setCheckedList((prevCheckedList) => [ ...prevCheckedList.filter((_, idx) => idx !== 0), ]); } setCheckedList((prevCheckedList) => [...prevCheckedList, value]); } }; return { attribute: { type: "checkbox", onChange }, checkedList, setCheckedList, }; }; // ========== usage ========== // /* const EXAMPLES = ["a","b","c"] const EXAMPLE_LABELS: { [key: string]: string } = { "a": "ê°€", "b": "ë‚˜", "c": "ë‹¤", } const exampleCheckbox = useCheckbox(EXAMPLES) return ( <div> <label data-is-checked={ EXAMPLES.length === exampleCheckbox.checkedList.length } > ì „ì²´ ì„ íƒ <input {...exampleCheckbox.attribute} value="allCheck" checked={EXAMPLES.length === exampleCheckbox.checkedList.length} /> </label> {EXAMPLES.map((example) => ( <label key={example} data-is-checked={exampleCheckbox.checkedList.includes(example)} > {EXAMPLE_LABELS[example]} <input {...exampleCheckbox.attribute} value={example} checked={exampleCheckbox.checkedList.includes(example)} /> </label> ))} <div>{exampleCheckbox.checkedList}</div> </div> ) */ /* input[type="checkbox"] { display: none;
